author: Ethan Feist
comment: Love the watch face, nice and, minimalistic with plenty of customization. There are a few bugs where after looking at a notificationl it doesn't display the correct time and mode for passive mode, this is fixed by going into active mode and letting it transition back into passive mode, hope they will iron that out though. Also, wish I could remove the spin transition hand and just have the second hand fade in in active mode. Favorite watch face thus far though.

author: Shane Martinez
comment: Update: never got that update as of 4/16... I really like it, though. There's a decent set of options in regards to color. The transition animation is very smooth and looks great. However, the ambient mode watch face is pretty lame compared to the active mode. Please add some additional options.

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: Thank you, noted. I tend to keep things very light in ambient mode mainly to avoid any potential burn-in and battery drain, but I will give more freedom regarding this mode and provide more options in next update(s).

title: Pretty cool but ambient mode is weak.

author: Chad Gaines
comment: I like the way the watch face looks with the cool animations, and all the different options as well. What it really needs is an option for hours markers though, because in its current state it is hard to actually tell the time, which kinda defeats the purpose of a watch
title: Hard to tell time

author: aaron
comment: haven't kept a non-stock watch face on my watch for this long since i purchased it six months ago.  minimal, material, and perfect.
title: great for moto 360.

author: John Ciaccio
comment: This should be included by default on every watch and the developer could get a royalty for it. Also the first face that has customizations right through the watch itself instead of through the phone app. Great work and beautiful!
title: Great watch face..

author: Crypto Jules
comment: Awesome  watch face. will definitely give 5 stars when there's  an option to show the time in number form an this will be one of my permanent watch faces. Please add the digital time feature, pleeease devs!!!!
title: Close to perfect!

author: Jamie Cullen
comment: I'd like to see the option for the minimal amount of card when I look at the watch. The card just covers most of the face when you wake the watch.
title: One of my favourite faces

author: Brayton Miles
comment: Great Job. Wish I could rate 6 stars. Adding the transition was awesome, thank you.
title: Wow! Dev fixed my only request!

author: Matthew Pringle
comment: Killing battery. Sw3
title: Needs update

author: DOCTOR J
comment: Please just add numbers as an option and its golden :)

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: Edit: Feature to work without it being in ambient mode added in version 0.1.5.

title: Amazing watch and developer

author: Νίκος Κορναράκης
comment: very nice animations and options :D really great watchface :D

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: Thank you Νίκος, fix is in version 0.1.5.

title: Perfect

author: Xuong Phung
comment: Can you add digital display pls

author: Robin Harris
comment: Thank you for this awesome face, great work!
title: My favorite watch face!

author: Ian Bowers
comment: Fantastic face, sweet features, and very responsive developer.

author: Axel Cervera
comment: Ohhhhh so it only shows animation when its set up in ambient mode? Because lately I've been using my Moto 360 without ambient mode to get more battery. So I was wondering why it wouldn't work when the screen turned on.

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: Thank you Axel, the animation is shown by default when you leave ambient/dim mode. Reply here or send me a mail including what time was it when the animation should have been shown but did not, I will investigate.

title: Love it (Reply)

author: Chris Perez
comment: This looks nice and has a good material feel, but I haven't seen the transition effect once... Edit: found out the transition is only for ambient mode. This should be in the description.

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: Thank you Chris, added to the description.

title: Looks nice

author: Dinico Win
comment: I buy every watch face from you man, my favorite watch face developer.  You're glitch animation is the king.
title: Dude I'm on it!

author: Kaige Gonia
comment: It's beautiful! Exactly what I've been looking for. You think though things like colour selection and fine tuning of settings could be handled on the phone? Kinda tough selecting colours on such a small screen. :)
title: Love it!

author: Raymond Leung
comment: I love the animation.  This is the first watchface I bought.  Suggestion:  On the ambient mode, can you add the option where we can turn off the time?  It would be perfect if it's all black (dark) and i'll watch the boot animation before I find out the time.

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: Edit: Feature added in version 0.1.5, set the brightness to 0% in the settings to have an all black ambient mode.

title: Great Watchface!

author: ZDK TAYLOR
comment: Love your work-->please consider digital hybrid (with hour & minute hands) and maybe adding numbers to watch face (not all just maybe 12,3,6 & 9) that could be in circles or balls (that would correspond to ur opening boot sequence and matching GooGle's Material Design)
title: Great Animations

author: Wilfred Noel
comment: Please let me make changes via the android wear app and alter the ambient mode settings. I would love the two screens to match. LG G Watch.
title: Love it

author: William Gongola
comment: Love the 60 fps and the glitch effect, 2 random add-on features that I really like!
title: Awesome!

author: Raed Oskoubi
comment: Best watch face ever.... Im so amazed... Thank u dev :)

author: Benoît `BoD` Lubek
comment: This one is very smooth, and has a modern (dare I say "material"?) design.  Nicely done!
title: Impressive!

author: Caden Ross
comment: I will reinstall this once you can put numbers
title: Numbers
